On the FHIR wiki is a hint at a new FHIR Implementation Guide article, but it doesn't exist.
FHIR Implementation Guides - General considerations for implementation guides
Is this link just wrong, or should I continue to use the "Old" guidance?
okay. I was hoping it was just a wiki link that needed correction.. thanks.
Out of interest is the "Old" guidance documented somewhere?
There is the old and a page on the IG publisher http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR see the "Implementation Guide" section on this page

Thanks John. I was looking to see what others had done with their implementation guides. We are looking to improve on the template we have for ours which yields something like : https://nhsconnect.github.io/CareConnectAPI/
I am working on how IHE uses the FHIR conformance resources with their IHE Profiles on FHIR... I am looking at the various tooling including ClinFHIR, Forge, Simplifier, and the manual method...
success is guaranteed... but the path is not smooth... :-)
